title: Welcome to FurniScape!
body: Thanks for joining us. Explore the latest furniture collections now.

title: Flash Sale Today!
body: Get up to 50% off on selected sofas and chairs. Limited time offer!

title: New Arrivals
body: Check out our new modern dining tables just added to the collection.

title: Free Shipping Weekend
body: Enjoy free shipping on all orders over Rs. 100 this weekend only!

title: Tips for Your Home
body: Discover how to style your living room with our latest blog post.

title: Limited Edition Chairs Released
body: Our limited edition handcrafted chairs are now available. Grab yours before stock runs out!

title: Refer and Earn
body: Invite friends and earn Rs. 200 on each successful referral. Start sharing now!

title: Festive Sale is Live!
body: Celebrate the season with up to 60% off on festive furniture collections.

title: Track Your Orders Easily
body: You can now track all your furniture orders directly from your profile screen.

title: Thank You for Your Feedback!
body: We value your reviews. Your input helps us improve the FurniScape experience.
